briefTitle: Progesterone Effect on Individuals Diagnoses With AD and PTSD.

outcomeMeasures.title: Visual Analogue Scale of Craving (VASC) Baseline no Script
outcomeMeasures.description: Visual Analogue Scale of Craving (VASC) is a self-report rating scale using the Likert scale (0 Not at all carving alcohol - 10 Extremely carving alcohol)

outcomeMeasures.title: State Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI-6) Baseline no Script
outcomeMeasures.description: Six-item State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI-6) is a psychological inventory consisting of 6 self-report items on a 4-point Likert scale. The STAI-6 measures state anxiety. Higher scores are positively correlated with higher levels of anxiety. STAI-6 scores are classified as "no or low anxiety" (6-12), "moderate anxiety" (13-18), and "high anxiety" (19-24). (minimum score of 6 to a maximum score of 24)
